run.script:
cd packages/myschoolapp-reporting
source .env
node ./dist/bin/msar.js snapshot --stdoutLevel all -u "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields username)" -p "$(op item get $OP_ITEM --fields password --reveal)" --sso $SSO --outputPath "$OUT" --all --association "Classes" --batchSize 12 --pretty "$URL"
